name: rab2ex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, universe)
-| wceq(c0, crab(s1, c1, w1))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wceq(c0, crab(s1, c1, w1))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

comment: A class abstraction based on a class abstraction based on a set is a set. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jul-2019.) (Revised by AV, 26-Mar-2021.)
